system.description:
Racial Traits

  • Sslythens are carnivores. Consuming food out of this diet causes them to become Sickened for 24 hours.
  • Sslythens have Lungdao as their native language and receive Trade Bant Simplified as a secondary language.

Racial Traits (Active Effect)

  • Sslythens have a base Combat Point score of 14.
  • Sslythens CHP formula is CON Score + 1.

Dragons

All dragons have tails that can be targeted. They have the same targeting rules as legs. Any armor that provides protection to legs, will also provide protection to tails.

Physical Description

A healthy Sslythen typically stands between 5¾-6½’, and weighs between 130-290 lbs. The males and females are nearly the same height. Male and female Sslythen gain strong, thick tails as they mature. Sslythen have thin scales covering their body, which are usually a light green to a dark green color. Sslythen do not have hair. The average Sslythen lifespan is 110 years, reaching physical adulthood between the ages of 19-24.

Language

The native language of a Sslythen is Lungdao. The will often speak Trade Bant Simplified.

Names

Sslythen have three names, the first being the given name, and the second being the clan name. The third name is usually the title, job, or designation given to that Sslythen, and changes when their job changes.
